Posts.EditableText:
It was obviously Jacques Tati's birthday..
So we all had a big celebration (AKA 'piss-up') and sat around listening to his story's, and posting up loads of stuff on here.

... No, we probably just had a load of visitors and double connections and members online (maybe a search-bot or two as well).
